text: Emil Iliev (; born 31 March 1997) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a midfielder. ==Career== Emil made his first team league début in a 1–2 home defeat against Lokomotiv Plovdiv on 26 May 2015, coming on as substitute for Daniel Georgiev. In February 2016, Emil was loaned to Kaliakra Kavarna for the rest of the season. On 17 January 2018, Iliev returned his hometown to play for Spartak Varna."Спартак 1918" започна подготовка с 13 нови футболисти ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=2|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan=2|Cherno More |2014–15 |1||0||0||0||—||—||1||0 |- !| Total !1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:PFC Cherno More Varna players Category:PFC Kaliakra Kavarna players Category:PFC Spartak Varna players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players
